name: The Arena - An AI Generated Game
name_original: The Arena - An AI Generated Game
description:
CONTROLS

WASD - Move

SPACE - Jump

LEFT CLICK - Shoot

SCROLL WHEEL or 1,2,3 - Change weapon

This game was made a a small test project for use AI in making games.

This game was designed by AI (OpenAI). Music was made by AI (Soundraw). Art was made by AI (Dalle mini, Craiyon, HotpotAi).
